title: Captain Tom Moore receives gold Blue Peter badge
description: The 100-year-old fundraiser joins the Queen and David Attenborough in receiving the accolade.

title: Climate change and Covid-19: Five charts about the biggest carbon crash
description: How the global pandemic is limiting carbon emissions and what this will mean for climate change.

description: Photographer Barry Lewis captures the spirit of a Butlin's holiday camp in 1982.

title: Coronavirus and climate change a ‘double crisis’
description: Many activists have had to stop their usual work due to the pandemic. Here's how they're responding.

title: Coronavirus: Inclusive choir finds voice in lockdown
description: The Soundabout Inclusive Choir is helping to overcome the isolation felt by some people with special needs.

title: Coronavirus: Sailors tell of months stuck on ships
description: Since March, many ports are refusing to allow crew changes or shore leave.

title: Coronavirus: How long it takes to recover
description: Weeks, months, even a year - we look at the factors that can affect the time taken to get better.

description: Ana Carmona was quarantined with her parents and siblings in NYC, when she got some big news.

title: Can you compare the UK with Italy on virus death tolls?
description: The UK has passed Italy's death toll but it's hard to make direct comparisons.

description: The coronavirus pandemic could cost cricket, football and rugby union almost £700m combined in the UK, leading figures have said.

title: The Met Gala ball is off - but stars dressed to impress anyway
description: The fashion extravaganza was axed, but some stars revealed their outfits anyway, and fans joined in.

title: Climate change: More than 3bn could live in extreme heat by 2070
description: Areas such as India, Australia and Africa are predicted to be among the worst affected.

description: The UK's chief scientist tells MPs mass testing is "part of the system that you need to get right".

description: The first minister stresses that changes will only be made to lockdown "when it is safe to do so".

description: A closely watched survey confirms that the service sector contracted at a record pace last month.

title: Cancelling autumn internationals would cost RFU £107m
description: The RFU will be hit with revenue losses of £107m if the 2020 autumn internationals are cancelled, chief executive Bill Sweeney says.

title: Coronavirus: Teachers warn of early school return 'spike'
description: Teaching unions across UK and Ireland say test and trace measures must be fully operational before reopening.

title: Coronavirus: France's first known case 'was in December'
description: The case means Covid-19 may have arrived in Europe almost a month earlier than previously thought.

title: Coronavirus: Key workers to trial NHS tracing app
description: If the Isle of Wight trial is successful, the app could be ready nationwide within weeks, ministers say.

title: China's three-time Olympic champion Sun appeals against eight-year ban
description: China's three-time Olympic champion Sun Yang appeals to Switzerland's highest court against his eight-year ban for missing a doping test.

title: Dame Judi Dench becomes British Vogue's oldest cover star at 85
description: The Oscar-winner says she hopes "a great deal of kindness comes out of this" current global crisis.

title: Rick Parry: English Football League clubs face '£200m hole' by September
description: English Football League chairman Rick Parry says the season needs to be concluded before 31 July and that clubs face a "£200m hole".

description: Professional Footballers' Association chief executive Gordon Taylor says halves of less than 45 minutes are being considered when football resumes.

title: Vue Cinemas hoping for mid-July reopening
description: The boss of one of Britain's biggest chains says cinemas can control social distancing.

description: Gino Bartali was one of cycling's greatest champions, but it is what he did when the sport stopped which endures.

title: All Blacks: Flanker Sam Cane named New Zealand captain
description: Flanker Sam Cane is the new captain of the All Blacks, following Kieran Read’s retirement after the 2019 Rugby World Cup.

title: Coronavirus: UK car sales plunge to lowest level since 1946
description: Motor industry records only a few thousand registrations as Covid-19 outbreak keeps buyers at home.

description: Why do fewer people seem to be having heart attacks and strokes? One theory is that the lockdown lifestyle is healthy.

title: Coronavirus: When might Hollywood reopen for business?
description: Cast and crews might have to quarantine together in the future when filming begins again.
